issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: All attempts at reproducing this issue failed, or not enough information was available to reproduce the issue. Reading the code produces no clues as to why this behavior would occur. If more information appears later, please reopen the issue.
resolution.name: Cannot Reproduce

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: we can define global Variables using Ti.App reference. but sometimes this doesn't As i experienced i have created Ti.App.userId & i logout with setting it null.But it keeps it value When i try to see my details so it seems not working always.Thats Why i have to use persistance data for this.
fields.summary: Global Variables seems not working always.

comments.body:
Suresh Sharma

Please read [How to Submit a Bug Report|https://wiki.appcelerator.org/display/guides/How+to+Submit+a+Bug+Report] which explains how to create a test case and submit a jira ticket.

That way we will be able to narrow down the issue and fix potential bugs quicker, thanks.
Can't reproduce this behavior. If need to reopen, please provide a test case.
